exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.SureButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" currentState="up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="290" height.up="85" height.down="85" height="85">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" source="sure_btn_png" source.down="sure_btn_png" source.disabled="sure_btn_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.CongradulationViewSkin" width="640" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect fillAlpha="0.6" width="640" height="960" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image width="650" height="500" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="end_endless_png"/>
	<e:Image width="309" height="62" y="443.09" source="endless_text_png" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Button id="sure_btn" label="Button" y="553.58" horizontalCenter="0" skinName="userSkins.SureButtonSkin"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.EndlessButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" currentState="up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="290" height.up="85" height.down="85" height="85">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" source="endless_png" source.down="endless_png" source.disabled="endless_lock_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.LeftButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="65" height.up="65" height.down="65">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             source="left_btn_png" anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" source.down="left_btn_png" source.disabled="left_btn_disable_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.RightButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="65" height.up="65" height.down="65" height="65">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             source="right_btn_png" anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" source.down="right_btn_png" source.disabled="right_btn_disable_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.LevelScreenSkin" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" width="640" height="960">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="slideLeft">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{levelBtnGroup1}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="900" ease="cubicOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{-600}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{levelBtnGroup2}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="900" ease="cubicOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{40}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="slideRight">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{levelBtnGroup1}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{-600}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="1000" ease="cubicOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{40}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{levelBtnGroup2}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{40}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="1000" ease="cubicOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{680}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
    <e:Image width="640" height="960" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8"                           source="level_bg_jpg" horizontalCenter="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Group id="levelBtnGroup1" width="560" height="483.64" y="73" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" x="40">
		<e:layout>
			<e:TileLayout horizontalGap="4" verticalGap="3" requestedRowCount="3" requestedColumnCount="4" columnWidth="140" rowHeight="170"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="levelBtnGroup2" width="560" height="483.64" y="73" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" x="680">
		<e:layout>
		<e:TileLayout horizontalGap="4" verticalGap="3" requestedRowCount="3" requestedColumnCount="4" columnWidth="140" rowHeight="170"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group width="200" height="65" y="596.3" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0" locked="true">
		<e:Button id="prevButton" label="Button" x="0" y="0" skinName="userSkins.LeftButtonSkin"/>
		<e:Button id="nextButton" label="Button" x="135" y="0" skinName="userSkins.RightButtonSkin"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Button id="endlessButton" label="Button" y="662.06" skinName="userSkins.EndlessButtonSkin" horizontalCenter="0" enabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="闯过第24关才能开启无尽模式哦~" y="754.66" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="26" textColor="0x00e9da" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.LevelSelButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" currentState="up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="130" height="150">
    <e:Image horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source.disabled="lock_png" source.down="unlock_png" source.up="unlock_png" source="unlock_png"/>
	<e:Image id="starImage" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="53" x="10" y="10" source="star0_s_png" anchorOffsetX="0" width="116" anchorOffsetY="0" height="32.12" includeIn="up,down"/>
	<e:Group id="numGroup" width="200" height="200" x="0" y="0" includeIn="up,down">
        <e:Image id="num0" width="44" height="64" x="35" y="26" source="num0_png"/>
	    <e:Image id="num1" width="44" height="64" x="64" y="26" source="num1_png"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.PropButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="108" height.up="194" height.down="194" height="194">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" source="tool_icon_png" source.down="tool_icon_png" source.disabled="tool_icon_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.SoundButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="50" height.up="43" height.down="43" height="43">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" source="soundOn_png" source.down="soundOff_png" source.disabled="soundOff_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.SelLevelButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" currentState="up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="290" height.up="85" height.down="85" height="85">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" source="selectlevel_btn_png" source.down="selectlevel_btn_png" source.disabled="selectlevel_btn_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.ReplayButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" currentState="up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="290" height.up="85" height.down="85" height="85">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" source="replay_btn_png" source.down="replay_btn_png" source.disabled="replay_btn_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.MainViewSkin" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="640" height="960" states="guide,game" >
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8"                           x="0" source="bg_jpg" y.guide="1.33"/>
	<e:Image width="370" height="150" y="0" source="title_png" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Button id="propButton" label="Button" x="476.21" y="-25.34" skinName="userSkins.PropButtonSkin" includeIn="game"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="soundButton" label="Button" x="572.21" y="16.66" skinName="userSkins.SoundButtonSkin"/>
	<e:Group id="levelNumGroup" width="200" height="56" x="26.66" y="118.94" anchorOffsetY="0" includeIn="game">
		<e:Image width="172" height="50" x="0" y="3.99" source="level_text_png" locked="true"/>
		<e:Image id="level_num1_Image" width="36" height="43" x="49.31" y="0" source="0_png" locked="true"/>
		<e:Image id="level_num2_Image" width="36" height="43" x="86.64" y="0" source="1_png" locked="true"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="gameViewGroup" width="640" height="393.33" y="166.69" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" x="0" y.guide="212" height.guide="269.33"/>
	<e:Label text="点击橙色边框方格，连接电路" includeIn="guide" x="125" y="515.98" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
	<e:Label text="让灯泡       起来，并开始游戏" includeIn="guide" x="125" y="572.67" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
	<e:Label text="亮" includeIn="guide" x="222.29" y="552.31" textColor="0xffff00" fontFamily="微软雅黑" anchorOffsetX="0" width="150" anchorOffsetY="0" height="82" size="50"/>
	<e:Group id="gameButtonGroup" width="600" height="86.91" y="584.69" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0" includeIn="game">
		<e:Button id="selLevelButton" label="Button" x="-37" y="3.03" skinName="userSkins.SelLevelButtonSkin"/>
		<e:Button id="replayButton" label="Button" x="296" y="3.03" skinName="userSkins.ReplayButtonSkin"/>
		<e:layout>
		<e:HorizontalLayout gap="20"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.CloseButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" currentState="up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="45" height.up="45" height.down="45" height="45">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" source="close_png" source.down="close_png" source.disabled="close_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.PartLineButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" currentState="up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="290" height.up="85" height.down="85" height="85">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" source="part_line_btn_png" source.down="part_line_btn_png" source.disabled="part_line_btn_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.ShowLineButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" currentState="up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="290" height.up="85" height.down="85" height="85">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" source="showline_btn_png" source.down="showline_btn_png" source.disabled="showline_btn_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.PropViewSkin" width="640" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect fillAlpha="0.6" width="640" height="960" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image width="650" height="500" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="end_tool_png"/>
	<e:Group id="buttonGroup" width="290" height="287.88" y="396.71" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Group width="290" height="140" x="-139" y="-26">
			<e:Button id="partLineButton" label="Button" x="5" y="38.12" skinName="userSkins.PartLineButtonSkin"/>
			<e:Label text="1.2元" y="9.52" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0x000000" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="290" height="200" x="-129" y="-16">
			<e:Button id="showLineButton" label="Button" x="5" y="38.12" skinName="userSkins.ShowLineButtonSkin"/>
			<e:Label text="2.4元" y="9.52" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0x000000" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:layout>
			<e:VerticalLayout/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Button id="closeButton" label="Button" y="799.55" skinName="userSkins.CloseButtonSkin" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.MoreGameButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" currentState="up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="290" height.up="85" height.down="85" height="85">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" source="moregame_btn_png" source.down="moregame_btn_png" source.disabled="moregame_btn_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.NextLevelButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" currentState="up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="290" height.up="85" height.down="85" height="85">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" source="nextlevel_btn_png" source.down="nextlevel_btn_png" source.disabled="nextlevel_btn_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.ShareButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" currentState="up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="290" height.up="85" height.down="85" height="85">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" source="share_btn_png" source.down="share_btn_png" source.disabled="share_btn_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="userSkins.SuccessViewSkin" width="640" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="showIt">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{rect}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="550">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0.6}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{group}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:Wait duration="550"/>
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="1000" ease="quartIn">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="hideIt">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{rect}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="550">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{group}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="550">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
		<tween:TweenGroup/>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Rect id="rect" fillAlpha="0.6" width="640" height="960" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="group" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Image width="650" height="500" source="end_success_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="starImage" width="130" height="36" verticalCenter="-86" source="star0_s_png" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Group id="buttonGroup" width="290" height="287.88" y="194" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0">
			<e:Button id="nextlevel_btn" label="Button" x="2" y="-127" skinName="userSkins.NextLevelButtonSkin"/>
			<e:Button id="moregame_btn" label="Button" x="3" y="-101" skinName="userSkins.MoreGameButtonSkin"/>
			<e:Button label="Button" x="13" y="-91" skinName="userSkins.ShareButtonSkin"/>
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
